channel.title: R Code on Live Free or Dichotomize
channel.description: Recent content in R Code on Live Free or Dichotomize

item.title: ENAR in words
item.description: I had an absolutely delightful time at ENAR this year. Lots of talk about the intersection between data science & statistics, diversity, and exceptional advancements in statistical methods. "By a small sample we may judge of the whole piece" -- -- I loved it, but letâ€™s see what others were saying! Check out this word cloud of the most commonly tweeted words. This certainly sums up my experience.

item.title: The prevalence of drunk podcasts
item.description: For todayâ€™s rendition of I am curious about everything, in Hilary Parker & Roger Pengâ€™s Not So Standard Deviations Episode 32, Roger suggested the prevalence of drunk podcasting has dramatically increased - so I thought Iâ€™d dig into it ðŸš§ðŸ‘·. I pulled the iTunes API for the term drunk in podcasts & plotted the results over time. I also finally found an excuse to use emoGG. library('dplyr') library('ggplot2') req <- httr::GET(url = "https://itunes.
